x_symbol.description: Resolve browser differences for event properties. This is an object prototype. Create an instance with the 'new' operator.

par.name: oEvent
par.note: the native event object passed to your event listener

prop.name: relatedTarget
prop.note: element - 'from' or 'to' target on mouseover or mouseout

prop.name: pageX
prop.note: integer - absolute X coordinate of mouse

prop.name: pageY
prop.note: integer - absolute Y coordinate of mouse

prop.name: offsetX
prop.note: integer - target-relative X coordinate of mouse

prop.name: offsetY
prop.note: integer - target-relative Y coordinate of mouse

demo.note: A good example of usage as well as a good page for testing xEvent.
xEvent is used in many of the demos.
